Reviews.Content: I probably don't need to go into the amount of detail that D.R.L. did in his review.  But thanks, buddy, your review is what pushed me into the final decision to buy the LG 47" LED model 47LN5700.  We are what you might call an "LG Family".  Within the past few years we have acquired (in order) an LG washer, LG dryer, three door LG refrigerator, two LG cell phones and now an LG large screen television.  None of these products has ever given us the slightest problem.  We (my wife and I are each 70 years old) are LG for life!Now for the TV.  Briefly, it has the best picture that we've ever seen!  Although we did not opt for the 3D model, nor did we opt for the Magic Remote, the picture quality and ease of use is fantastic!  It set up quickly and easily. The set faces an outside wall with a large set of windows that are on the west side of our room.  That means the amount of brightness between noon and sunset is huge.  With our previous set, a Phillips 50" plasma, we actually had to close the blinds and even then had difficulty seeing the image.  The LG 47LN5700 has very strong picture brightness and contrast (combined with the flat screen finish) so that glare is NEVER a problem.  In spite of the light level in the room, the image is very easily viewed.  Once the sun sets and the room darkens, the image automatically adjusts and the picture quality is still first-rate.  In fact, throughout the brightness spectrum the HD picture almost looks to be 3D.  Even older programs appear to be near-HD quality.Finally, the Smart TV aspect of the set is really exciting and easy to use.  We have Pandora, YouTube, and Netflix as well as MLB.TV active.  We have downloaded a number of apps already.  We use the web access to review emails and surf the web.  The plug'n'play aspect of the USB input means that we are able to video our grandson's baseball games and our granddaughter's swim meets on our little flip video camera, come home and plug it in to the LG USB port, watch and listen to the action.  Fantastic!!!  And we've only had the set for five days!  Can't wait to see what the next few weeks bring.  This product will change our entire concept of home entertainment.  Thanks, LG (and Amazon!) for making a product of such great quality so affordable!!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture. Excellent Sound.
Reviews.Author: James A. Nichols
Reviews.Content: I was really excited to upgrade from my previous Insignia Tv to this one made by LG.  There is a huge difference in quality.  The picture seems to be more vivid even though both are HD televisions.  I also love that this one is a Smart Tv where you can search the web, check facebook, play games, and use other apps that are preloaded or pick new apps. Web was very easy to get to and search.Setup was very easy and I had it hooked up in no time.  If you use the inluded stand there are 7 screws to attach to connect the stand to the TV.  But that took no time at all.  Also connecting the wires was very easy and the Tv weight is about 30 lbs so it is very light to pickup and place on a stand or a console.The Tv setup is very easy and walks you through setting up your language, time, and channel settings.  This is also made easier with the very comfortable and user freiendly remote.  Also if there is a system update to the TV you can still watch Tv while it downloads the update you just need to reset it after it completes download for the update to take effect.The Tv picture is very crisp and I love the sound of the Tv by itself it does have settings to switch between to a Cinema or Game sound which are very useful when watching movies or playing games.Overall I am very pleased with the picture and sound of the Tv.  I watched over the air Tv, Avatar, Cars, and Planet Earth to sample and the quality of all were excellent.  I would definetly recommend this Tv.  My only problem is that there is not a Amazon Instant Video App but I am sure there will be soon.

Reviews.Title: Not-so-smart TV
Reviews.Author: Yuri Mackeyev
Reviews.Content: Pro: The picture is really good. As good as on my other not-smart **** TV I bought for 1/2 of price of this 47LN5700.Con:1. Black background is not even; this is especially noticeable in dark scenes.2. TV is really slow to react on remote buttons. Switching channels takes 3-6 seconds. If you want to run the included browser, it will take a long time to start.3. Resolution cannot be left on "Just Scan", when computer is connected (resolution 1920x1080, works flawlessly on other, not-smart, TVs) the TV always turns in to either to 16x9 or 4x3. Sometimes it works well when you switch LG on, usually it doesn't. First I thought the software upgrade would fix this, but it didn't help much, just added lots of useless new apps.Other thoughts. It comes with Skype installed, but the regular, non-LG camera won't work. Apparently LG wants me to buy one of their ones? Buy something else from LG? Thanks, I'm done.

Reviews.Title: Arrived Malfunctioning & Terrible Service
Reviews.Author: Courtney S Stahr
Reviews.Content: I am not satisfied with my new LG 50LN5700. I connected everything thru my Xbox One, checked all systems and they worked.The next morning I tried to change, with the remote, my input from component to HDMI and the TV locked-up...I unplugged and waited ten minutes...plugged it in and still the TV locked up when I tried to change inputs thru the remote.I connected it to my network, checked for the current software version and downloaded the new version...still locked up.I called LG customer service; no help whatsoever, when I could understand him. The LG representative said a LG qualified repair tech would call in three to five days to set-up an appointment...Really!?The new TV which serves me very well as a paper weight.Update: The issue with my NEW LG was the motherboard; it was replaced Sunday morning, February 23...twenty days from the TV's arrival.The service person was local, of course, and very knowledgeable...but, regardless of this only positive experience, it is the last LG product I'll purchase; it's back to Samsung, for me.

Reviews.Title: Sound is terrible
Reviews.Author: Annabel Garza
Reviews.Content: The sound is terrible. I am going to have to buy a sound bar. My alarm clock sounds better that this.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Sharon H.
Reviews.Content: My husband loves his new TV. It has worked out very well in his guy space and is the perfect size for his space.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Nancy Newbold
Reviews.Content: Best Ever !!!! Love this TV, easy to set up and enjoy within a few minutes.  Just a huge advancement over regular TVs

Reviews.Title: Happiness Is...
Reviews.Author: Bing
Reviews.Content: Totally the best TV we've ever owned. After fussing with the "Expert User" controls, we've got it the video and audio right where we want it. The tonal EQ controls are good enough to be able to make the sound quite "big" by pulling down the midrange and boosting the bass. Plus ClearVoice II contributes added audio clarity, flexibility and customization possibilities. We've never seen a 2-D picture look quite like it's going to pop right off the screen like this one—and it's heavenly with an Apple TV and fast internet connection.This was a great value.

Reviews.Title: I'm all set up!!  And no Magic Remote with this one!
Reviews.Author: C. Alexander
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice for my needs!I bought the Orca Flat Digital HD TV Antenna to go with it as I don't have Dish network in this room,(my woman's cave)....but with Amazon Prime I can watch all the movies I want off my Wifi connection. Although I didn't need the wifi LG 330 DVD blu-ray player, I added that for watching my own purchased DVDs.Also, I would like to add..........this TV did not come with the magic remote like my 55" LG came equipped with,REMOTE CONTROL and I'm very glad for that. I don't care for the magic remote as it is waved around like a wand but works like a PC mouse. I found a replacement for it numbered AKB73615314 and sold by "Order Parts" on Amazon. I wrote a review for it too. I mention this only because some of you may be interested if you also have a magic remote for another LG TV. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: So far it is great!
Reviews.Author: PAW
Reviews.Content: Opened and set up just two weeks ago. All went well but haven't attempted to use the Wi-Fi features yet. Picture has great clarity and am surprised by the great sound with the internal speakers.It is unfortunate that the Magic Remote is not included.

Reviews.Title: Awesome user-friendly, crystal-clear HDTV!
Reviews.Author: Ndrw
Reviews.Content: Such a solid TV, easy set-up, and easy to use!Make sure to utilize the Wi-Fi capabilities, the Smart apps, and download an APP for your mobile device that allows you to use the browser and go through the menus more easily.Type in: 'LG touchpad' when you search for it; the APP makes life much more easier!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: Love it works fine arrived earlier than estimated easy to set up haven't had a chance to Mount it on the wall with the wall mount I bought for it

Reviews.Title: Superb!
Reviews.Author: IrvinJ
Reviews.Content: What can I possibly say, its "LG" and this particular model [42LN5700] for the money paid presents a superb picture. I have no CON'S what so ever. I am more than satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Krista White
Reviews.Content: Clear picture and minimal outer frame. Easy to use, size is perfect. Highly recommend - this is one of the highest-rated TVs based on Consumer Reports.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, bad sound
Reviews.Author: Peter Joseph Zaki
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very good, but the sound is really bad. Specifically, the sound goes up during effects and music and down during speech. I've tried everything in the settings, including the auto volume and the "ClearSpeech" option which is meant to remedy exactly that problem, but it's no use. If you intend to use this TVs speakers as the main audio source, I don't recommend it. If however you have a home theater sound system or a sound bar, then go or it.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Not LG's best, but it certainly kicks the competition to the curb.  With a little calibration, this set produces great picture quality.  The screen can have somewhat of a glare, and the screening material can let out more light than desired in pitch dark scenes, but the picture is so rich and bright than this issue is almost un-noticeable.  Brings everything you wish for and is capable of more, including an immense collection of compatible apps.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: chica
Reviews.Content: Works great. Could be a little easier to maneuver but I am only using the remote that came with it. The price was about $200 cheaper than local retailers and the quality is great. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: bairwoman
Reviews.Content: We have had this TV for about a month now.  The picture is much clearer than the LCD TV it replaced.  The set is also a lot lighter.  Installation and set up was a snap.  I was actually looking at a different brand in the store when I noticed the color clarity in this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Paul Waldron
Reviews.Content: I love LG. This is my second LG smart tv. We bought the 55" 2 yrs ago for the living room and it is excellent. We bought this for our bedroom to replace our old tube tv. I updated the software right away and have had no issues. I did tweak the settings to my liking which drastically improves the picture. I think the sound on this tv is pretty good for an lcd tv too. I would highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: A Few Problems
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: I bought the LG 47LN5700 Smart TV. I also bought a DVI to HDMI cable so I could connect my Mac Mini to the LG. Here's what I discovered: I first brought up Safari on my Mini using its own monitor. Then I plugged the Mini into the LG and I also plugged a wired mouse & wired keyboard into the USB LG ports. On the LG display, the Mini window only occupied ~1/4 of the LG display. The Mini toolbar was not displayed at all. The dock applications would not work. I could not surf with Safari. In short, the LG did not function as a monitor for my Mac Mini. Maybe it will if I work at it but out-of-the-box it does not work. Somewhat of a disappointment. All is not lost, however, the LG has its own browser so I can (slowly) surf the www.Edit Jan 25, 2014: The LG unit has started exhibiting some bizarre behavior. When I turn it on, the LG logo shows for about a second, then the screen goes dark, then the LG logo appears for another second, then the screen goes dark, etc. This repetitive behavior goes through many cycles; the most I have counted so far is thirty-one (31). After "enough" cycles, the LG behaves in a normal manner.Edit Feb 12, 2013: I scheduled a repair session (under warranty) to fix the cycling problem. The technician replaced the power cable connecting the main & power boards. That solved the cycling problem. The technician said this was a fairly common problem with LGs. From my verbal description of the problem he had ordered the cable and then brought it with him on his visit. The technician also solved my problems using the LG as a computer monitor by changing various settings. The LG warranty service appointment was painless to set up and satisfactorily solved my problems.

Reviews.Title: LG Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Linda Rucker
Reviews.Content: I love my HD Smart TV best TV I have ever had.I would recommend this TV to everyone great quality

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Nancy Graves
Reviews.Content: So far we have enjoyed many things about this TVThe picture is outstanding, and the 40" size fits perfectly in our oak entertainment centerI had a hard time finding that sizeWould recommend this to everyoneThe wireless is really great too, but we are still learning about that technology

Reviews.Title: Simply the best TV in it's class
Reviews.Author: Paul F. Duenas
Reviews.Content: Not enough room to describe this TV, simply put it is by far the best picture quality in it's class. All the bells and whistles for a 47" Smart TV, everything I expected and more. Don't miss out!

Reviews.Title: BETTER THEN I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: BEVERLY PATE
Reviews.Content: PICTURE IS VERY CLEAR, SOUND IS GREAT  EASY TO ADJUST TO YOUR OWN SPECIFICATIONS. DON'T HESITATETO BUY THIS TV

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: This TV has really great picture and good sound. It's not gonna give you the wall rattling of a big subwoofer if that's what you're in to but it definitely is loud enough with clear sound. To take advantage of the great picture quality you will want to use hdmi cables and check with your cable provider on getting hd channels. I know for my cable provider it makes a big difference if I'm watching the regular channels vs. the hd versions of the channels (it's about 2 1/2 times the resolution).Also, the build in wifi is awesome. You can access your netflix, hulu, etc. or even just search the web, maybe watch youtube videos, with one click of the remote. I haven't gotten the magic remote yet, but it seems like it would be a nice accessory. When you're surfing the web you use the arrows on the remote to move the cursor and it can be a little time consuming. That's when the magic remote would be nice because from what I understand, you just point and click.My only real complaint is sometimes when I access the web, the cursor doesn't show up so I cannot select anything or even select the browser to start typing the website. So, far I've just exited the smart tv feature and selected it again and it usually shows up (but once in awhile it does take a couple of times doing this).Overall, excellent tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: What a TV should be
Reviews.Author: S. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great features. I love the android/iphone app. Free download and it's essentially like having a trackpad for your TV. My galaxy S4 noticed the TV on the network first try. Shows pictures from my gallery without problem. Screen mirroring worked as well to play videos. Netflix works flawlessly. Integrates with the LG sound bar for amazing sound.1 star subtracted for such poorly designed sound system. You need to purchase a soundbar. I would like to see a model where the LG soundbar was included at a discount in a bundle.

Reviews.Title: not as sharp a picture as I hoped
Reviews.Author: Anne Atkin
Reviews.Content: overall it's ok. This is my first 50 in. flat screen TV. The picture looks faded to me. I've tried all the settings and have it on vivid color and it still looks washed out. There is also an 8 inch shadow on the upper right side of the screen. I need to call for support, wish me luck.

Reviews.Title: Not as Smart as the 2012 version with lack Amazon app
Reviews.Author: Joseph Lewis
Reviews.Content: If you are like me you read a lot of Amazon reviews before a purchase is made.  So yes I was for warned that the LG "Smart TV" lacked an Amazon app so that those with prime could stream movies and shows directly to the TV.  Yes, you can also hook up a Kindle Fire to the TV and stream from that but in todays fast moving world that seems like having an 8 track to cassette convertor.  One of the purposes of my review is that someone from LG actually reads our comments and they realized that sales may be lost to a "Smarter" TV manfacture that knows how important it is to allow registration of the device on Amazon Prime.  Any comments LG?

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: M. Kirkland
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tv.  My only regret is that I live in a rural area and available internet speed will not support the 1080p without long buffering periods.  I am returning this tv and purchasing a 720p tv, which will work in this area.  I loved the crisp, beautiful picture on the LG 1080p, but I use Roku and stream much of the tv I watch.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Albin Brenkus
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup.  The HD is excellent on this TV.  Would definitely buy again and recommend to friends.  Amazon purchase made it quick and easy.

Reviews.Title: MY TV ADVENTURE
Reviews.Author: TERRY BERKOBEN
Reviews.Content: I decided to surprise my wife with a new TV while she was visiting California. I had been doing exhaustive research into various brands and features. I decided on the 47" LG model number LN5700. I placed the order to arrive the day before my wife got home. It arrived as promised and after assembling the stand and hooking the cables, I turned it on wanted to be wowed....but nothing....a mostly black screen with bluish lines running through it like rivers on a map. I called LG support and they walked me through a few steps with no results. They then set up a service appointment for the following day. The serviceman looked at it and immediately said the screen was broken from the inside and not covered by the warranty. I called Amazon explained the situation to them and they said I could get a refund or replacement. I opted for replacement and they overnighted it to me with no charge. They also arranged to have the broken TV picked up. Amazon and LG were terrific through this whole ordeal.Now the TV.....Opened the new one and the set up was very easy. The picture is easily set to your preferences and after going back and forth experimenting you're sure to find a beautiful picture. I have another LG and the new one's picture is better than I expected. The LED-LCD seems to be a much better picture technology. The sound is very good without a soundbar although I will probably add one.This TV has the Smart TV Technology and I am not sure whether this was necessary or not. The TV is still new and I haven't experimented with the Smart TV options. I'll update when more information is available.Overall I love watching this TV and am continually impressed with the clarity and color of the picture. I have always had good experiences with LG products and with Amazon.com and neither disappointed.Terry

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: Jose B.
Reviews.Content: I had bought this tv for my daughter and all i can say is wow.. the picture is excellent. It makes you feel like your actually in the action from a view point.. amazing..

Reviews.Title: confused!
Reviews.Author: Gilbert Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The product information said that it is 1080P (TRUE) however the information also said the it was 120 HZ and on the back of the television it reads 60 HZ hmmmm? not sure.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I've Owned
Reviews.Author: Danyele Graham
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent. Love the "Smart" option, combined with my Appe TV there is very little need for cable or satellite subscriptions.TV is positioned approx. four foot off the floor in a built in book case. Viewing the tv from the couch or other seats in the room the picture quality is hard to beat. Of course set up is simple.

Reviews.Title: Very nice television
Reviews.Author: DoggieMa
Reviews.Content: Very nice television and no complaints so far.  Pretty easy to set up.  Although I had to change the factory settings as picture was very dim and dull.  Once I changed the settings, picture is very nice.I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Amazing operating system
Reviews.Author: Mauro
Reviews.Content: This review is for the 60LN5700. I've owned Sony, Samsung, Phillips, LG, and Panasonic flat screen TVs. This is, by far, the best of them. My first LG TV (42LH20), was not my first choice at the time, but the price was fairly good, so I bought it. Had never owned any LG products, and I have to say that I never like the brand - can't really say why. The fact is that the operating system was amazing, Changing channels was rather fast, menu options were easy to navigate and understand, good sound, etc. I think that is THE main reason why now, when getting a smart TV, I wanted LG. The smart TV functions are mind-blowing, the internet browser supports flash, which allows me to watch embedded videos (no other TV I've tried supports that), it has great sound, great colors. I connected Logitech wireless keyboard and mouse, and they work really good for internet browsing and for other TV options. It is really a great TV set.

Reviews.Title: Good TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: John C. Walborn "jmanbroncofan"
Reviews.Content: This TV isn't going to blow you away or make you want to sit down and re-watch The Sopranos in its entirety to see what it looks like now, but it's a solid product and we got an amazing price.

Reviews.Title: What a piece of $700 junk!
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL G.
Reviews.Content: Yes the picture is very nice, but after only 5 months this TV started just randomly turning off. That was bad enough, given that this was a huge purchase (to me), but once I started to try to get it repaired (still under warranty luckily) it took 5 months to get the issue resolved! After MUCH frustration, time, 50+ phone calls, I am finally getting a full refund. LG customer service is the WORST and I would not recommend buying a product from them just for this reason. From the lousy call reps (outside the country) to the local warranty repair company, the service was terrible. And obviously this TV is a piece of junk - after 3 repairs (they won't do anything until they've attempted 3 repairs) it is still had the same original problem. Do NOT buy this TV or any LG TV unless you have a lot of time on your hands and don't mind giving your hard earned cash to a company that does not care about its customers or product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, got many compliments
Reviews.Author: Abu Imak
Reviews.Content: This tv is awesome and the display is awesome. My small complaint is that the apps and what not are slow.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Guillermo Valdes
Reviews.Content: This LG has everything we need to enjoy TV and Internet.  The clarity and size are excellent, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Chris Evans
Reviews.Content: The TV was delivered on time and in good shape. The quality of the picture is awesome. I can access the internet easily for YouTube and Netflix, etc... no complaints here

Reviews.Title: Product unsatisfactory
Reviews.Author: Dwight T. Stoneburner
Reviews.Content: Delivered as promise but tv didn't work. Spent over an hour talking to lg rep but couldn't scan channels, got nothing but snow & couldn't even turn off unit with remote!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Sk "skbykes"
Reviews.Content: Read about flashing on and off after a few months of owning it... Then you can't get it replaced and your stuck with a lemon for a tv

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: L. Singer
Reviews.Content: If there is any flat screen with a better picture I would have to see it to believe it. When the broadcasters use their best equipment the picture is so excellent it is Three D without the glasses. In my book LG is the best out there. Amazing! Also, this was a "PRIME" shipment and so you know everything was double correct and on time as always.

Reviews.Title: TV Works Great But The Sound Sucks
Reviews.Author: Brian A. Sekerak
Reviews.Content: You will need a sound bar no question the TV is quite, I think due to the speakers being on the sides and not the front. It could also be the wall layout of my house, which does not help.  As far as the TV picture quality goes, its great no issues as of yet.  I also love that it has wifi capabilities huge plus for me, but all TVs are getting that as a standard now so definitely not the biggest selling point.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Scott R. Keiser
Reviews.Content: Love this TV.  Been using it for a few months now and it is great!  Good clarity, hooks up with everything, and is overall a great value.  Love the Smart TV feature for watching movies from Amazon!  Awesome!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: swathi thimojapalli
Reviews.Content: so far so good. its been more than 3 months and its worth to the price. nice picture quality and network connectivity. though it hangs up at times.

Reviews.Title: Bright display after few adjusted settings
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Swift "swift"
Reviews.Content: Love my SMART TV. I did a lot of hunting around to find the perfect bedroom TV and i'm very happy with this one.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: John L
Reviews.Content: I won't get too technical in my review since I used previous reviews to decide on my purchase. This is a great TV at a good price. I decided on this one because of the Amazon Instant Video...who knew they'd come out with Fire TV a month or so later.

Reviews.Title: does everything
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: has great picture, LG link, works great as my main monitor. cant really complain about anything other then i wish it was 120hz refresh rate.

Reviews.Title: Great Xmas Gift
Reviews.Author: J. Gallaugher
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my future mother in law. I live upstairs in the duplex and have wifi and Netflix for her to use, so it made sense to give her something to enjoy it on. She was still stuck back in the times of tube televisions so this was a significant upgrade. She immediately hooked it up and got it all set in her living room.She uses it all the time for entertaining guests and to keep the grandkids/my niece and nephews entertained.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Shane Francoeur
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect for the game room or man town, and the fact its a smart TV makes it that much better.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: dave pappas
Reviews.Content: Had TV for 4 months now. Great picture! Added a Sony sound bar. Remote is a little hard to navigate with but couldn't be happier with the HD picture.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: fitz
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month now and have had no problems. The picture is great, once adjusted for your needs. The sound is much improved over my last LG. I made my final decision to buy the LG brand when I found an article on the internet that claimed it was among TVs least needing repairs. In addition, my 4-year old small LG was still going strong.I hope this one lasts as long or longer.

Reviews.Title: Smart electronics dumb user interface
Reviews.Author: akhennessey
Reviews.Content: Wanted to buy a 42" smart TV, but couldn't find one.  This one doesn't"t fit, but it works well.  The TV is smart but the user interface is really dumb; it lacks an intuitive aspect that one would expect from a "smart" system.  Had to phone for assistance to figure out how to use some standard features.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to install and setup. It requied a little tweaking with the settings but other reviews helped.
Reviews.Author: Richard Mellick
Reviews.Content: It really is a great TV. It was shipped and arrived on time as scheduled. The auto brightness is still not right for our room. It is too dark when there is little light in the room

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Pumwee1
Reviews.Content: This is my second LG tv and they are great tv's.  Picture is outstanding, set up was easy. Had a bit of a struggle with the LG smart sound bar. Definitely a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: The perfect TV for the pad
Reviews.Author: Jr D "Jr D"
Reviews.Content: Now first off, let me just say I may be biased. Let me explain: I have never had a new TV. Always hand-me-downs, nothing broken but never up to par with the modern piece of the time. Finally, I was able to catch up and let me say it is absolutely wonderful to do so.After messing with all this TV's settings there are so many opportunities for any environment or form of entertainment. Really, just learn some tweaks and it can bring any picture to crisp, clean, 1080p 120 Hz of pure amazement.Seriously now, time to veg out.

Reviews.Title: Great TV so far
Reviews.Author: joewyo
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace a couple of Vizio units that went out prematurely and were returned. It has the best picture quality of any TV I have owned. Lots of apps and connected easily to my home wireless network. Only con I can think of is I couldn't figure out how to pull up an on screen keyboard for passwords, etc. Not much of problem as you can connect a usb keyboard to use for the pw's, browsing, etc. Have had this unit for about 4 months and will update this review if anything changes.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Terrie B
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV - we use it as our second TV underneath our big screen TV when there are two kinds of sports programs on at the same time.  You can mute golf and baseball and still know what is going on.  It was an easy set up and color and sharpness of the picture I would give 100% even on an analog channel.  The only downfall and it's not a big issue is the location of the Smart TV key which takes you into the Smart TV selections.  It is right above the up arrow when maneuvering through certain aspects of the TV and sometimes you accidently hit it because it is right there in the way.  This is an important key for the TV set so it should have been placed in a little spot all by itself not by a button you use all the time.  Other than that, I would highly recommend it.  We also bought this TV because it has access to my Amazon Streaming of movies without having to use another device.

Reviews.Title: HDTV
Reviews.Author: MPL023
Reviews.Content: Great Price and fast delivery.  My TV was on its' last leg when I placed my order and my new set arrived in two days. thanks to your prime membership.  It is a great set with more features than I need or can operate but it has a great picture and sound.  I'm very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great price. And quality.
Reviews.Author: Salvatore Bruno "ChiTownPhoto"
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality, best price. It arrived quickly and safely. This model has great features and an awesome picture. It was easy to install once I bought HDMI cables. Consumer Reports gave this one and a Samsung top ratings.

Reviews.Title: love love love
Reviews.Author: shelly
Reviews.Content: One of the best purchases I have made in a long time!  Tv is clear and so many smart features!  The remote has to be pointed directly at tv to work and has a clicking button noise. But that is the remote the tv is great!

Reviews.Title: New customer for life! My FIFA 2014 World Cup TV...
Reviews.Author: Ruel
Reviews.Content: As a first time customer to LED TVs i searched and researched thoroughly until i made up my mind with this model. I know LG & Samsung are the leaders in this class of entry to mid-level smart TVs and went for LG because of more features/options.The only thing needs constant work for any TV is tweaking the settings for viewing. That said there aren't much recommended settings for this on Google. The picture wizard is simple to use but doesn't always produce the end-result that is wanted. My suggestion is to start form here:AVS forums and also tweaktv.comI would definitely recommend as this tv is inexpensive and great value

Reviews.Title: This is one fantastic television.
Reviews.Author: Brett Evans
Reviews.Content: Love it. Best purchase I've ever made. I was overwhelmed with the service Amazon provided. Quick and efficient. The television was easy to set up, and the picture is AWESOME.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Doug Keller
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my 2nd family room.  It is exceptional.  I have had a number of people comment on the quality of the picture on this set.

Reviews.Title: me or them??!!
Reviews.Author: Dennis Bollefer
Reviews.Content: great tv having trouble setting up the smart tv - - won't see my wi fi might be my stupidity not sure but will stay with it till I get it!

Reviews.Title: Not a Samsung.
Reviews.Author: Marc52
Reviews.Content: For the money I paid, I feel it's an 'OK' HDTV.My two other Samsung's blow the LG away in terms of both picture and sound. After reading all of the reviews screaming "WOW,.what a picture!!" I guess I am a bit disappointed overall.

Reviews.Title: Overall i am happy with the TV
Reviews.Author: hxj127
Reviews.Content: for the purpose of watching TV, i think this is great. The color looks pretty natural. Easy to install and set up.

Reviews.Title: love this t.v.!
Reviews.Author: Theresa Rice
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, easy to program, amazing picture. The remote is badly set up, but I can live with that.

Reviews.Title: smart TV
Reviews.Author: Some Guy
Reviews.Content: Problem with all these smart things is they seem to be too smart fore.  I use this when working out to watch Netflix and listen to streaming radio.  It probably does a thousand other things most of which I'll never know about.....but the picture is great the controls easy, and it's wirelessly connected to my network and that's all I care about.

Reviews.Title: Great Televison, great value
Reviews.Author: EWR
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT Television. The picture is amazing. I have not had the opportunity to utilize the Smart features yet but I suspect they will work great also.Regards,

Reviews.Title: The picture is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Kilch "Walter"
Reviews.Content: Wow! What a cool TV. Granted it is our first flat screen, the picture blows my mind. Needs a sound bar for quality sound.

Reviews.Title: Screen flickering
Reviews.Author: Edwin
Reviews.Content: Nice set when it works.  Here's the problem -- the screen flickers to the LG screen whenever it feels like it.  It started a month after I bought the tv -- but at first I thought I had an issue with my power cord.  NOT.  I contacted tech support, and they wasted my time with a bunch of tests that yielded no resolution. Google "LG screen flickering" -- this is a widespread issue.  Buy another set.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sarah Searcy
Reviews.Content: This TV was a steal at the price we paid!  The picture is crystal clear, and has never caused us any issues.  You wont regret it.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, bad sound
Reviews.Author: Keith Viator
Reviews.Content: The picture is good and what I expected. The sound and volume control is not what I would expect from at this price point. You will want to invest in some sort of external speakers if your room is greater than 10x10.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Jacques Antoine
Reviews.Content: Just got this and mounted it on my wall, so this is just a first reaction sort of review. We have a 42" plasma, which is the standard I'm comparing this to. The black is not a black on this LED-LCD as on the plasma, but otherwise the picture is very fine.The sound is decent for a flat screen TV. I'm perfectly content with it as is and won't bother installing any external speakers or a sound bar--they're too fussy for me, and typically involve a second remote. No thanks.It's surprisingly light, much lighter than the smaller plasma. Mounting it on the wall is a one-man operation. Also, the frame bezel is quite thin, so thin that it doesn't look very imposing. Once it was on the wall, I had to check the box to make sure it really was a 50" screen (it is)--because it doesn't seem much larger than the 42" plasma, which has a much thinker bezel. It's quite an interesting effect, a small TV, but a huge screen.The "smart" features are easy to use, and setup is a breeze. No technical genius is needed. You don't even need to read the manual. Setting the audio and visual characteristics is a little more complicated, but it's not at all challenging to work through the menus. It can even be vaguely entertaining. The default settings make everything look like a soap-opera or a PS4 game. But it's easy to fix that just by choosing Cinema mode or Game mode. Customizing further is not essential, but by no means difficult.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Crystal Sorensen
Reviews.Content: I'm super happy with my purchase, the TV is beautiful, color, interaction, and design are all A+. My only complaint was that I paid extra for Saturday delivery and it didn't come until Monday.

Reviews.Title: BEST TV
Reviews.Author: L. Friedman
Reviews.Content: I CAN'T BEGIN TO TELL YOU HOW BEAUTIFUL THIS TV IS.  SCREEN SIZE IS GREAT FOR BEDROOM,THE IMAGES ARE SO CLEAR.

Reviews.Title: Love it.  Great TV for price.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and the picture is incredible.  It has access to most of the popular sites; Amazon, Netflix, Hulu, etc.  I would definitely purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Good picture and sound but difficult to use
Reviews.Author: Susan S "Susan S"
Reviews.Content: The sound and picture quality of this are good, but it is not easy to use, especially compared to my last television.  There are extra steps for Input, CC, and Sleep.  The on-screen instructions are not always clear, and even though the website has information about use, that doesn't always match the visual image on the screen.  Some of the problem comes from my lack of experience with technology, but this remote/television setup seems more complicated and less intuitive than it needs to be.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 50LN5700 50-Inch 1080p 120Hz LED-LCD HDTV with Smart TV LG
Reviews.Author: Arthur T. Davis "maudiib"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the above for my brother as a house warming present. He absolutely love this smart tv. He has it for a couple weeks now and still investigating all the options. Picture, sound, options, wifi, and every other consideration has exceeded his expectations. The price is excellent, was shipped, and received as advertised.I am planning on getting one for myself, just need to make space for it. I highly recommend LG Smart TV for anyone interesting in a quality product. Also, LG is a dependable name and quality of product..

Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: Christopher Middleton "TerribleInstinct"
Reviews.Content: The only things that I do not like about the TV are: I think it does not have enough ports for IO; the remote control is not nearly responsive enough. In my opinion, everything else is solid.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Berger
Reviews.Content: Great picture crisp and clear, lots of apps although I use Roku for apps. Not sure about the sound quality because I run  this through an HT system. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Lots of value for your dollar
Reviews.Author: Alan Thornton "Tru_Trojan"
Reviews.Content: This LG is a great value for the price and functionality! The smart function of the tv is cool and convenient but unnecessary so if you could take it or leave it, save the extra bucks and buy a ruku or Apple TV. In my case I wanted this kind of tv specifically so I'm enjoying it a lot. The picture is crisp, sound is clear and very sleek design. There are built in features that add to the quality of the picture and sound depending on the show or movie you're watching, even Eco friendly features!

Reviews.Title: Very nice picture
Reviews.Author: Richard "Entrepreneur, and triathlete powered...
Reviews.Content: I don't use the smart TV with my internet, but the picture is clear and the TV is just the right size for an apartment.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V.
Reviews.Author: M. Gaston "watch guy"
Reviews.Content: Had this t.v. for about 3-4 months now and I love it.  This is my first flat screen but I didn't want to spend a huge amount of money. I had originally decided against a "smart" t.v. but am glad I did get one--its features work perfectly with my router. I have the 50" model and use it in a small apartment.  I have had no problems and really like the picture and colors.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: James A. Micca "JM"
Reviews.Content: The LG 47LN5700 is excellent. Plug in and in a couple minutes it ready. Very very happy with picture and sound

Reviews.Title: TV Smart
Reviews.Author: Russ Hampton
Reviews.Content: this thing seems great it has so many features it will take me awhile to figure it all out and the picture is very good.I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Akmuradov
Reviews.Content: Big enough for a small living room. If you are watching a movie, go to the picture settings and turn the true-motion off so you will see that the movie becomes cinematic.  If you have divx ( .avi) movies, just put those in a flash drive and watch it with the usb input. It supports many video formats.  To connect to your network, I suggest you cat7 ethernet cable if possible, faster connection is always good for streaming videos. Everybody says the headphone output level is low, it is correct, but you can live with it. I used optical cable with optical to analog converter which gives better result. In this connection you need to select the audio option as lg optical. Picture quality is perfect!

Reviews.Title: This is a good LED TV for sports
Reviews.Author: T. Cole
Reviews.Content: I only had room for a 32" TV, so plasma was not an option.  This TV is not carried by Best Buy or any local stores, so Amazon was my only option.  The TV displays sports with no blur that you sometimes see with LED/LCD.  You still have some color fade when viewing from a significant angle, but with an LED, there is no way to avoid this.  I am pleased with the TV and would definitely recommend it to anyone who is buying a 32".

Reviews.Title: Got a size I needed
Reviews.Author: Frank "Frank in Bensalem"
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend's cabinet would have been crowded with the next size.  It's a great TV - we both love it - LG was in all the rooms at Harrah's AC - so I expect it will last, too. Fabulous picture and infinitely adjustable to your tastes in pictures, not 3D, but internet ready - nice unit LG.  Price was right, too. She has Comcast.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Smart TV
Reviews.Author: UPSTATE HSL - Information Resources
Reviews.Content: This 47" LG totally met our expectations in all aspects.  Being our first HD "modern day" television, we couldn't be happier with our choice.  We knew we wanted an LG product and we are not sorry we went with this particular model.  Beautiful picture, super easy on-screen set-up and easy navigating thereafter.  Love, Love!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: gary heyman
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money Clarity could be a little better but to be honest I have not had the time to tweek it yet. I intend to use a dvd for honing and fine tuning the TV which I have bought from monster to do just that. The sound could use a leveler so when the commercials come on it stays the same level as the program that your watching which I have on my Toshiba TV but again I have paid a lot more for that TV then this one. I have even bought a higher end LG 55 inch 7600 series which is really great so LG is on top of it's game...

Reviews.Title: The price is right.
Reviews.Author: VIKTORSDADDY
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality after you fiddle with the picture options.  I've had issues with the tru-motion feature (de-judder).  Every once in a while, it seems to stall for a second.  Sometimes, usually in a dark scene or when a large object moves suddenly, the de-judder gets confused, apparently, and strange artifacts/visual glitches occur.  This could just be a defect of my television, but it's really minor and the option can be switched off.  This glitchiness doesn't seem to affect the video games I play whatsoever, just movies and television.  For such a large television, this is a great deal.  I don't really use the smart tv features; I just watch Netflix on my PS4 (the PS4 looks amazing on this TV, by the way).  I recommend this to anybody who's looking for a nice, large TV with great picture quality at a bargain price.

Reviews.Title: First big screen tv
Reviews.Author: djp
Reviews.Content: Like it! Verly pleased with packing, shipping and delivery. Everything fine. Unit is performing very well. Would like a bit more written instructions in the booklet on how to use the features. Really haven't had time to use the "smart" aspects yet. Overall, very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love our new tv!
Reviews.Author: Overachiever
Reviews.Content: Love the smart features of this tv.  Fairly user friendly (we are first-time owners) of a smart tv.  Only criticism we have at all is that it frequently auto-adjusts the screen if the lighting changes.  This is noticeable and we even turned off that feature in the settings.  Otherwise, we love the tv.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Software Developer
Reviews.Content: I only wish I had purchased it sooner. I had been living with a first-generation 37" Sharp flat-screen for nine years (which I paid over $2000 for) and you could not even begin to compare the two sets!

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture and smart TV functions
Reviews.Author: D. Mccann
Reviews.Content: Got this for $600. Perfect for our family room. We paired it with a Vizio 5.1 surround system and it makes for great home theatre. Netflix, Youtube work perfectly and load quickly. Not quite as sooth an interface as the Apple TV we have on another set, but almost as good. Has not crashed or had any hangups with the smart functions. Overall very happy with this set.

Reviews.Title: I love this tv (even though I think it's probably smarter than me)!
Reviews.Author: Maureen A. Walters
Reviews.Content: I chose this tv primarily because I went into a Best Buy store where there were probably 50 tv's on the wall and this had the best picture quality.  Hopefully one of these days I'll learn all the smart functions.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I thought this was 1080/120. it shows 1080/60 on the screen.  The price was greater than the lower 1080/60 TV

Reviews.Title: Nice TV with good smart tv options
Reviews.Author: sudhanshu badhwar
Reviews.Content: I purchased it a month back and really like the picture quality and superb ease of connecting any of my device to it.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Sue Morris
Reviews.Content: Great purchase!  The picture and sound quality are exceptional.  The Smart TV features that we've used so far are easily accessed.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Nathan Griggs
Reviews.Content: Read several reviews on multiple websites and the majority were more than happy. I'm very impressed with my first LG product.

Reviews.Title: Great Image
Reviews.Author: vdp1965
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and the picture quality is superb. Wish they would have made a qwerty type remote for it in order to make it easier to type.

Reviews.Title: Nice television
Reviews.Author: Zoie
Reviews.Content: Good price.  Nice picture.  Love all the apps. Audio is not the best - will get speakers.  Shipping was the worst (took about a week with prime which was supposed to be 2 days), otherwise I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: 50 "LG HDTV
Reviews.Author: gary wandtke
Reviews.Content: Very pleased-beautiful color and clarityI would suggest to someone to definity to at look this model.Has Smart  TV included

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: N/A
Reviews.Content: TV arrived ahead of scheduled delivery and in good condition. I am a little inept with electronics; however my son set the TV up and we have been very pleased with it. Picture quality and sound are both good. I would definitely purchase another LG product.

Reviews.Title: i like LG products
Reviews.Author: leslie marria
Reviews.Content: I like the simplicity of design, the ease and simplicity of hook-up/installing, and the price after applying amazon points!  I am most pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Support
Reviews.Author: Mark C
Reviews.Content: This TV is fun and well built. Clear screen. Easy menus for differing needs. I bought the magic remote later but it's not here yet. I had to use customer service once initially because I didn't see part of the mounting stand in the box. I opened it from the other end. I took pictures of what I had, sent them to the tech. She told me what I was missing. I took another look, and there it was. Setup is a breeze. I used the HDMI cable to my PC as a monitor. I have an OTA antenna in my attic to get over the trees, but instead of running  another line down to this TV, I bought a multi-directional amplified digital flat antenna to put behind the TV on the outside wall. That should do the trick for most of the shows I want for free OTA. I setup Netflix and it works great. I used my IPAD mini as a remote controller so I can sit where I want and type away. The family thinks that's cool. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: james broussard
Reviews.Content: setup was fast and very quick  picture quality is crisp and cleanLG has great support staff to assist at a moment notice with complete video on setupand even how to remove tv form box

Reviews.Title: No swivel and camera for skype
Reviews.Author: Kevin Copley
Reviews.Content: This TV is great. It didn't get 5 stars because of several key features. The stand does not swivel.  Also sure Skype is a feature of the smart TV function. However it seems you can ONLY use An LG brand specific camera, cost you ask? $199.Otherwise a great interface to the internet. Very easy to use and absolutely brilliant picture quality. I'm very impressed except for the two mentioned shortcomings.

Reviews.Title: Love the set
Reviews.Author: Melody
Reviews.Content: Great Xmas gift. Easy set up great picture tooThis is our second LG smart TV. Great product.Love it

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Sharpe
Reviews.Content: There wasn't a single TV on the market with more features or better picture quality in this size for $599. Would buy this TV again in a heartbeat given the chance.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Reader
Reviews.Content: I just love this TV!!!  It is sharp and clear with brilliant colors.  It is also user friendly.  I am so happy with my purchase both quality and price wise.

Reviews.Title: Fit the Bill!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Closson
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for our entertainment wall unit.  Sharp picture and color.  Smart t.v. adds a new dimension for us and we are enjoying learning all that has to offer.  Sound could be better, but could be a result of being inside the wall unit.  Will probably add a sound bar.  Overall, though, a good buy!

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Chad Solheid
Reviews.Content: Easy to install with the cheetah wall mount. Great picture. Easy to follow menu. Still learning about all of the features that work with our Direct TV

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: judy foreman
Reviews.Content: love the LG TV. Picture is great, easy to hook up, packed nicely in the box & instructions easy to understand

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Dani N.
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the Black Friday sale, it came very fast (because I used Prime). No scratches or anything on the TV. Works great, picture is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Great Value, Horrible Sound
Reviews.Author: William Hadler
Reviews.Content: Everything is great about this HDTV except two things:- The sound is dreadful. Solution: buy a sound bar.- Stand does not rotate. Solution: deal with it.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Ginger
Reviews.Content: Love the TV. Our old tv was a box style, cannot believe the the difference. LG was recommended by a family member.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: R Chaikin
Reviews.Content: New TV for mom. She loves it. Not using any advanced features, just watching plain old TV via cable direct from the wall.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: snyperdan
Reviews.Content: The picture on this thing is AMAZING!!! The Detail!!!!  OMG, if you are thinking of buying a new tv, you could do a lot and I mean A LOT worse. Being able to connect to the internet is AWESOME! $79 a year and I get over 44,000 movies from Amazon Prime, beat that, I dare you to try.  TOO HAPPY!!!

Reviews.Title: Setting up a pain
Reviews.Author: Norman J. Lavallee
Reviews.Content: I chose LG because of its reputation. But setting it up was a pain. Instructions are not for the average person. Had to get and pay for somebody from cable co. to finish setting it up

Reviews.Title: Best value
Reviews.Author: Gary R. Turner
Reviews.Content: I have found the LG brand of led tv's to be superior to the competition based on price and performance.  This TV is designated as "smart" due to its ability to directly to connect to the internet through  your home router.  If you enjoy seeing You Tube video once in a while you will really enjoy them on a quality 47inch TV.  Color quality is first rate

Reviews.Title: Quality Product
Reviews.Author: Ann G Smullen
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd LG television....each one bigger than the previous. The smart feature is fun when TV is bad!!

Reviews.Title: Great choice for us!
Reviews.Author: Dani S.
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV to replace our ancient dinosaur in the living room.  We did quite a bit of research before purchasing, and ultimately decided on LG because of good reviews.We needed a not-so-big set for our smallish room, and this size just fits the bill.  This LG has great picture clarity and screen size is perfect for our our space.  The only drawback that we've noticed, is a very slight difference in the sound quality (compared to our old beast).  All in all, this set is everything we were looking for, and at a good price.  Set up was simple, with clear instructions.  Delivery was fast and the packaging was in pristine condition.

Reviews.Title: lg = tv 32ln5700
Reviews.Author: Tanya Lynn Roberts
Reviews.Content: this smart tv is awesome by lg.  it's got everything I wanted in a smart tv.  good bargain for the price, picture is great, the apps are really good.the internest is great too.everything about this tv is awesome.I glad that I bought it. I mounted on my wall, and it really looks good. I am 100% happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Wow, LCD what a difference
Reviews.Author: Darth Mom
Reviews.Content: the TV came in with two men unpacking and putting the TV on the platform as requested. We kept the box (just in case) it was easy to set up for internet since we have Netflix, but we are still tweeking the sound. There is another review that helps with that. PS: watch out that LG will track your activity if you don't turn off the two areas of tracking. Otherwise the TV is great. It replaced our projection TV and it was a wonderful improvement. Love the TV and have had no problems with it to date. (bought it just before xmas)

Reviews.Title: So glad
Reviews.Author: Rayshell Clapper
Reviews.Content: This TV is great. It has a clear picture, great sound on its own, and looks fab on the wall. I'd totally suggest this for anyone who wants a TV.

Reviews.Title: LG 50" Smart Television
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This television makes whatever you're watching look so life like; the realness of the picture, the colors and various functions  makes me want and even bigger one!

Reviews.Title: LG 47 inch HD smart TV
Reviews.Author: Chuck Gruss
Reviews.Content: Very happy so far. Prompt delivery with no damage. Bought the remote for Internet use. Would highly recommend. Great to be able to get on youtube and all other apps.

Reviews.Title: Good TV; poor sound
Reviews.Author: Silver
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the picture quality on this television, but it has done very poorly with sound. Plan to invest in external speakers, or upgrade your purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: DanielRPelletierSR
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV very sweet and clear online sign on great the hole look of item LG best so far better than my Samsung.

Reviews.Title: This TV is awesome!
Reviews.Author: J. Reamer
Reviews.Content: It exceeds my expectations!  Super picture.  Nice menu system.  iPhone app for remote control.  Integrated with my FreeNAS system via Minidlna.  Auto firmware updates.  Works well with Netflix and Youtube.  Highly recommend this television!

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Douglas F. Britt "Magic Doug"
Reviews.Content: Wow, what fun applications and great picture!  Love this tv!  It takes some time to learn it as there is a ton of functionality, but once you do learn it it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: excellent picture quality
Reviews.Author: Ann Belzer
Reviews.Content: delivered on time, and set  up..great picture quality...lots of options as a smart TV...happy with the experience...thank you very much

Reviews.Title: So in love with this TV
Reviews.Author: mari penshurst
Reviews.Content: I am still learning all the great features on this TV. It was a cinch to set it up with my new cable  service. I love the way all my streaming products load up up easily.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: keith paris
Reviews.Content: The price was excellent.The picture was crystal clear. The only issue I found was that it seemed to be able to only handle audio from one source.

Reviews.Title: Love the True Motion!
Reviews.Author: Elissa Pineda
Reviews.Content: Love the True Motion! Fits in out inlet perfectly. Picture quality is amazing and the sound is clear and crisp.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Rahul
Reviews.Content: Good tv, features are good, picture quality, sound .. Everything is good, only small concern is with remote cause it works slowly .. There should be magic remote given for this tv to make sure it is easy to move cursor

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Terri G. Davis
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  The picture is superb, the only draw back is the volume but that is fixable.  I am so happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Robert Gallion
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to fit into a particular cabinet where I was limited by space. It fit the cabinet and it fits the bill as far as having a great TV. It is not the biggest or most expensive TV I own but it is my favorite. Easy to operate, great picture. Not to complain about at all.

Reviews.Title: Love my Tv
Reviews.Author: Dwayne Hutchinson
Reviews.Content: The tv is awesome!!i just love it..easy to set up, nice looking, and pitcure quality is just awesome!!Connecting to my wireless was flawless, and i have not prob using the smart features.

Reviews.Title: LG LED Smart tv
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up & easy to mount.  Very pleased with purchase.  I was able to track travel of package.

Reviews.Title: Enjoyed it!!!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Herrera
Reviews.Content: Pretty good television, love the way it looks at the end of my living room. Just wish The colors and brightness would popout a little better. Overall Pretty darn good.

Reviews.Title: Your Search Stops Here
Reviews.Author: MrBlonde
Reviews.Content: I was going back and forth between this one and the Samsung 46in Smart TV. I ended up on the LG and couldn't be happier with my choice. Hooking up to my wireless was a breeze and I was able to load up Netflix in two shakes of a lambs tail. I read a few reviews who said the sound quality was sub par, but I don't see what they are talking about. The sound sounds nice with the regular cable hook up, but I still might purchase a sound bar for watching Netflix movies.TV is also great for gamers. I hooked up my PS3 and was blown away by the image quality. Great Tv - Great Price!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Picture
Reviews.Author: Bob Anderson
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is first class; easy setup; Smart TV functions are simple to understand and navigate. Would recommend to anyone considering new TV

Reviews.Title: This is a wonderful TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: T. O. Connor
Reviews.Content: We've been watching non-flat screen TV for quite some time without actually being able to discern much.  We decided for Christmas we'd get a flat-screen TV and see what all the hubbub was about.  Imagine our joy and relief when this fabulous TV arrived, and we were able to utilize it immediately, once we mounted it (not taking much time at all).  We are able to see cable TV, Netflix, Youtube, and other programs online, and are very pleased with the connections (for example, to see blu-ray and even utilize outside speakers if we want) that come with the TV.  We love this nice, large-screen TV, and heartily recommend it to others.  :)  Best wishes and prosper well!!!

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: JG
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up.  More technology than I bargained for (that's a good thing).  Trying to pare it with a WiDi device(s).  That technology is not-quite-ready-for-prime-time.  More likely it's the transmitter's fault and not the TV's receiver.  Anyway, I bought the TV for an entertainment/commercial application.  Let's see how it holds up.  Really appreciate the lighter weight.

Reviews.Title: Good picture but lacks audio outputs and inputs
Reviews.Author: Frank T. Yannett
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very good and there are a lot of features. The setup was quick and everything works as expected. However there are too few audio inputs and outputs on this device. The headphone jack turns off the speakers and there is no override for this. The closed caption is either on or off with no on with muted sound setting. Since I use these features I'm not completely impressed with this TV. It is a good second TV for me.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic in every way
Reviews.Author: Phyllis
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I really love this TV.  It was so easy to set up, all I had to do was turn it on and pay attention.  The "Smart" TV did all the work.  I sincerely like LG TV's and this is my second LG, but my 1st Smart TV. Beautiful clear picture, excellent color, and great sound, all from one devise.  Very pleased, and I would recommend this to any one  especially people like me with little or no experience in setting up electronics.

Reviews.Title: I would definitely buy another!!!
Reviews.Author: nicola mark
Reviews.Content: Its sleek design is very attractive and the settings are very easy to manipulate.  I love the fact that I can simply insert my flashdrive into any of the 3 USB ports neatly hidden at the back of the television and do anything to my leisure ( listen music, view a movie).  The initial setup was very easy as well and extremely user friendly, especially for a person like myself that possess minimal patience for electronic installation.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 55LN5700 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz LED-LCD HDTV with Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin McDonough
Reviews.Content: new tv has been great.  It was delivered before Christmas and we were able to enjoy all of the Christmas specials as well as access movies and tv hows through the smart tv, netflix and hulu plus apps.  My favorite is Pandora, so that I can listen to great music.Kevin M.Summerville, SC

Reviews.Title: I like. ..
Reviews.Author: Ismael Dutchover
Reviews.Content: Tv is great.  Remote could be alot better. I would highly recomend this tv to someone wanting to buy a smart tv.

Reviews.Title: Loving the picture quality and features!
Reviews.Author: PittrPatt "PattyL"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as an early birthday present for my hubby. Very easy setup to base and stand with provided hardware. Easily plugged into an existing Bose sound system and DirecTV cable box; had to go out an purchase a new HDMI cable though. Connected to Wifi and immediately downloaded the upgrade patch and disabled "collection watching info". Thus far, features and performance are excellent.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Southern
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound are both great on this TV. Beautiful pucture and great sound. Perfect size for my living room.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, right price !
Reviews.Author: Raghav Kaushik
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV at about $650 and I can safely say that it has impressed me all the way.Setup is a breeze. It connects to your internet without issues, updates automatically and you are up in no time.Picture quality : 4/5Audio:  4/5  (you cannot expect too much from cheap tv speakers anyway)'Smart'ness  : 4.5/5 - really smooth and non-clumsy interface.Things you should be wary about: TruMotion might cause artifacts and create more bad than good to you. Tv is great with TruMotion disabled.

Reviews.Title: Everything it promised!
Reviews.Author: J. Oldridge "ScottiePerson"
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV! Came packed exactly right and very fast. Only drawback that I can think of is that it had no app for my ACORN TV and I hate that! Have to import it through my computer, so bummer there. Great Picture, great sound and really user friendly. Very well balanced, in fact, it sits quite well on a double cabinet unit. I would tell anyone to buy this  at this wonderful price. Thank You!

Reviews.Title: TV very excellent clarity
Reviews.Author: Thanks Amazon
Reviews.Content: TV very excellent clarity tereo headphones the sound is clear and enjoyable Shaped device stylish and beautiful TV is very interesting

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: Aaron A. Brooks "ccZaphod"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to hang on the wall in the Master Bedroom.  With an articulating mount, it's been great to position just right for viewing.  Easy to configure, nice smart-features.  The SmartTV software found my Mac upstairs with my iTunes movie library and made created folders with various sorts (genre, alpha, etc).  Very easy to use.  Nice streaming over my home network.I haven't tried the WiFi on it -- I ran gigabit ethernet through the attic and down the wall to install this TV and my TiVo Mini.  I found a nice recessed plug - A/V outlet here on Amazon and installed it behind the TV -- no wires showing!

Reviews.Title: lg 42inch led --- Great tv
Reviews.Author: ft
Reviews.Content: Worked right out of the box.Excellent picture, Great options and very light weight.Very happy with the LG. Great price, good quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mark W.
Reviews.Content: Last TV was a 7000 series Samsung.  I was looking for another 7 series Samsung in a 47" I came across this one and couldn't resist at the price.  Wow what a great TV. Kids use all the features without any issue.  I would buy another one for sure.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Darren
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my parents. Great picture and sound quality. I can't believe how lively and vibrant the picture is.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Christine M. Garner "Work for Peanuts"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!  Easy to use and love the wi-fi. Nice picture quality and perfect fit for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: LG tv
Reviews.Author: SIrish
Reviews.Content: We gave as a Christmas gift and they were very pleased.  It was easy to set up and start using.  Extremely happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Positives out weigh the negatives
Reviews.Author: Scott R. Loring
Reviews.Content: The TV sets up quickly and easily even for someone who is not comfortable with new technology.  The Picture is rich, detailed and impressive.  However the factory settings made films look too real. Films looked like bad soap operas.  After some internet research I was able to adjust the settings (use game setting, remove smoothness) so now shows shot on film look rich and details without looking freaky.  Next item was the smart TV settings, I signed up for Netflix and Amazon Prime. Both work easily and offer a wide variety of programming at the touch of a button.  However a couple of days after setting the TV up the TV said the wireless connection was not connected.  I would re-enter all the info and passwords and it still wouldn't work.  Then suddenly it would be connected again on its own.  Called Amazon customer service and they admitted that I was not the first person to have this issue. They recommended I get Cisco-Linksys WET610N Dual-Band Wireless-N Gaming and Video Adapter and gave me a refund of the $83 bucks it would cost.  I added the device and it's worked well since.  All in all a great TV once all the adjustments are made.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: G T KNIGHT
Reviews.Content: Overall a very good flat screen LED screen TV. Good color and contrast, good blacks, off angle viewing is better than some, remote is easy to use and price is competitive for similar sized TV(s). Sound from built in speakers is not bad, but lacking in base(of course) like most others. Plenty of volume. A small external sound system with a sub woofer makes a huge improvement. I will add a center channel speaker for better voice projection when watching movies or videos. This is a good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Overall a good TV and a good price performer
Reviews.Author: alt
Reviews.Content: This is the second LG TV I've purchased. I think LG provides the best bang for the buck and so far this one hasn't disappointed. .The picture is very good from all angles that I am concerned about. It is easy to set up and use - for the most part. Since I have wired internet at the TV location, I haven't tried the wireless function but wired seems to work very well. The only issue I have is that the instruction manual is poor - with virtually no complete explanation of the various options in settings. This needs improved.

Reviews.Title: Review of our new LG television.
Reviews.Author: kathleen brown
Reviews.Content: I love the picture and it is such an improvement over the old tube TV we had.I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Dan S. Birdsill
Reviews.Content: Now here is a great TV.  We got it all set up a week ago and everything works great.  It may seem a bit expensive but in comparison with others, its a good value for this type of TV.  We will see in months and years ahead how well it holds up.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture!
Reviews.Author: Zachary schreiber
Reviews.Content: If I hadn't already bought then returned 2 other smart tv's (samsung and sony) that I was very disappointed with then I might have given it four stars. The picture is way better than the washed out samsung's, and it for the price you get so many more features than sony offers. It seems all tv's have terrible sound these days and the smart tv interface is still new and very clumsy, so I wont fault lg for that. Just remeber to dial down the "Trumotion" picture setting if you don't like the "home movie" effect.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV but had to call LG once for fixing
Reviews.Author: Cem Sahin "Cem"
Reviews.Content: My fiancee and I love this TV. It is the right size for our living room. We really like the "thin border" around it. The SmartTV apps it comes with are sufficient for our use. We mainly use Netflix and Pandora. It is great to be able to stream directly to your TV without having to connect a Bluray player or another streaming device. It has 3 HDMI ports so it is great for having multiple devices connected. Built-in WiFi is very useful and extremely easy to set up. Using the keyboard on the TV is a hassle with the remote; however, I would recommend everyone to download the "LG TV Remote" app (I have an android) on their smartphone and you can use your cell phone as a mouse! It made our lives so easy once we figured that out.The reason I had to take off a star is because after about 4 months use, our TV broke down. We called LG Support. They were very helpful and dispatched a technician fast. It turns out the motherboard somehow fried itself. Nobody had any explanation on why this happened. In any case, it is fixed now (although, we had to wait for the part to arrive for about a week) and has been working fine since. The TV comes with 1-yr manufacturer's warranty. However, we also purchased the extended LG Premium Care Plan (I believe Amazon recommends this when you add the TV to your cart) so we should be all set if anything happens again. I would highly recommend this TV and the premium care plan.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Devin
Reviews.Content: I am not disappointed one bit. This TV is worth every dollar. Tons of cool features and it looks great with my Xbox one.

Reviews.Title: Super Duper Picture
Reviews.Author: labtec
Reviews.Content: As far as the TV part of this thing, I am really satisfied. The picture couldn't be clearer. I read reviews of a lot of other brands complaining about ghosting. This happens when you are watching something like football and the picture is trying to keep up with a football that is mid air after being passed by the quarterback. You see the image of where it is, plus the fading image of where it  just was a split second ago.So far I have not seen any of this at all with this TV. The only thing I have reservations about is this. It is a "smart" TV. That means is has a computer within the cabinet of the TV. On things that don't require much memory, it is fine, but it is supposed to be able to show anything you normally get on a computer. The memory in it can't be much. If you try to watch a movie like on Amazon Prime, the picture never comes up. Finally an error screen comes up telling you that there is not enough memory. I am trying to find out if I can add memory, like you do on a computer, but so far no luck finding out. I guess I'm going to have to talk to LG themselves.One other thing. The remote is the most mickey mouse thing I have ever seen. The most aggravating thing is that you almost have to attach a level to the remote. I mean to tell ya, if that sucker ain't perfectly level, it don't want to work. My old satellite remote will let you cock it almost to a 45 degree angle up, down, or side to side  before it gives up, but not this thing. Luckily the only time I use the new remote is when I have something from the internet pulled up. The rest of the time, I use the satellite remote.

Reviews.Title: Great picture but poor sound
Reviews.Author: Robin Schumacher
Reviews.Content: I got this TV as one of our family Christmas presents this year. I was very happy with the setup and configuration - took just minutes to catalog all my digital TV channels and connect to my wifi for internet access. The picture is excellent and the remote works fine (so do the LG remote apps I put on my phone and tablet to control the TV).The big complaint is the sound. Very tinny and thin no matter what setting/config I try. With some movies, the dialog is nearly muffled out. So I bought a Sony soundbar with sub-woofer and now the sound is great. Only issue there is the LG optical settings (both of them) won't let me control the volume via the LG remote. I now have to use two remotes, which I don't like.Again, good TV, great picture, but I have to give it 4 stars because of the above issue.

Reviews.Title: This is a real smart TV!
Reviews.Author: Hyuk-Jin Lee
Reviews.Content: This is a real smart TV! I simply like it as it offers so many valuable functions w/o any trouble.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jan V. Jensen
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Easy to set up.  Haven't used the smart TV much as yet.  Kind of a pain without a keyboard and mouse.  Wish that it had an icon to Dish Network.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Phil X. Katz "Video Guru"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. I mounted it to my bedroom wall with a Cheetah Articulating LCD TV Wall mount, and I watch it every evening.The picture is great, the sound is better than I expected, and best of all, I don't need to hook it up to cable, satellite, or even an antenna.I watch Netflix and Amazon Prime movies on it using the wifi signal from my computer in my home office, and I can even watch movies I've purchased and saved on my PC. I also have it connected to my cell phone and tablet, so I can stream movies from there as well.Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Would highly recommend.
Reviews.Author: Brian Babson
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Easy to use controls.  Great price.  Love the built in wifi.  Can't think of any cons to say about this tv.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Marcie Buxton
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with this TV. We bought the TV refurbished but it looks and works as if it is brand new. The TV was delivered on time as well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv!
Reviews.Author: david owen
Reviews.Content: TV works great with a very nice picture. Very easy to acess and download apps! Best tv in my house!

Reviews.Title: LG 42" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Gaudet
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. Was not looking for a smart tv. The price was just a little more so I decided to buy. Lots of features. Very good buy.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: jeffrey vincent
Reviews.Content: and a great price. Simple to install, easy to navigate. only negative for me is that the screen is pretty reflective, and that it won't let me download adobe flash separately to watch xfinity movies and shows, though it's fine for Netflix, etc

Reviews.Title: Leans forward in the stand
Reviews.Author: G. Keefe "Go Devils"
Reviews.Content: Nice TV.  Great picture after alittle playing around with the settings, but it does have the same problem that other LG TV's do, it leans forward over 3" when it is attached to the stand.  It would give you the impression that it either isn't meant to be in the stand but mounted on the wall, or they don't see a lean like this as a problem.  Either way it is noticeable and unless you want to attach it to the wall to "anchor it" this is something to consider.
